post.body: Hooray! She and I can OCD plan our wedding together muwahahahaha!
Oooh! I'm dream of that this morning as I sleep :)
Merry Christmas! :)
I realized I gave you my business address. Will pick up later today, I promise :)
<<<<<<Hugggggg>>>>>>>>
ROFLMAO!!!
That's OK - I <3 her too so we can all live together muwahahahaha
Oh great NAO you tell me! Harumph! LOL
Yes - you are one of my wittiest friends, and it is completely appreciated! :)
Haha! Don't worry - I still lub you :)
Oh you should follow @markdavidson so you can see the full exchange (Oh - and it's @kellyshibari - with a "y", not an "i") :)
I got some great Borghese muds, wonderful Brookstone slippers...and a @markdavidson in a pear tree, it seems :)
Yes - pressure works too. This might be fun after all LOL!
Perhaps. Or this might be my "lump of coal". ROFL!
I'm a handful. But if you are man enough for the task, then the answer is Yes :)
Well, you only live once, I suppose... :)
Wait...I was "Awww"ing so much that I forgot that last sentence. Free ain't cheap, mister!
Awwwwwwwwwww!
Night Night people! See you in a few hours - need to rest a bit before Twitterlating again :)
OK - been up all night celebrating Christmakah and working on a blog design that just plain ROCKS my socks off...going to bed nao. Zzzzzz
